named-query.name: Subscription.findByUserId
named-query.query: SELECT o.subscription FROM UserSubOrder o INNER JOIN o.user u WHERE u.id = :userId

named-query.name: User.findBySubscriptionTypeAndDateBefore
named-query.query: SELECT o.user FROM UserSubOrder o INNER JOIN o.subscription s WHERE s.type = :subType AND o.createdAt <= :subDate

named-query.name: User.findBySubscriptionTypeAndDateAfter
named-query.query: SELECT o.user FROM UserSubOrder o INNER JOIN o.subscription s WHERE s.type = :subType AND o.createdAt > :subDate

named-query.name: User.findByDateBefore
named-query.query: SELECT o.user FROM UserSubOrder o WHERE o.createdAt <= :subDate

named-query.name: User.findByDateAfter
named-query.query: SELECT o.user FROM UserSubOrder o WHERE o.createdAt > :subDate

named-query.name: User.findBySubscriptionType
named-query.query: SELECT o.user FROM UserSubOrder o INNER JOIN o.subscription s WHERE s.type = :subType
